name: TASOMACHI 黄昏ニ眠ル街
description:
[Machine translation]
Girl Ukumo gets on a journey by boarding a boarding boast.
As soon as I arrived in Oriental town I visited with some errands, Danamocore, the power source of the airship, runs out.
I decided to explore the city to collect DanamoCore, but the city was quiet as if I had fallen asleep.
There was no human figure that should be living there, only cats of cats were left ...
"TASOMACHI" is an adventure game where you can freely explore the oriental fantasy world.
You will become Ukumo, explore the magical city and revive the energy of the airship that has been exhausted with the items you got, the goal is to go ahead.
· Let's get lost in a mysterious city where a relaxed time flows, and explore freely
· Enjoy communication with residents
· Let's adventure various places such as highway, bridge, valley
· Please enjoy a unique oriental fantasy world
TASOGARE NI NEMURU MACHI (TASOMACHI) means Japanese in A city sleeping in Twilight
